Event Title: Cocreation workshop for ESOs that submitted concept notes
Objectives [Key goal of event]:
·	To help participants understand the 10X program and what it seeks to achieve in terms of the objectives, pathways to work, impact and the different components
·	Enable participants understand what is expected of them in their proposals in terms of: impact, intervention design, sustainability, finance, target audience.

Event Title: Follow on co creation between ESOs and platform providers.
Objectives [Key goal of event]: To deepen collaboration between Entrepreneurship Support Organisations (ESOs) and platform providers.

Event Title: Due diligence for the second call of ESOs
Target Audience [Who is attending?]: ESOs that have been passed the evaluation stage
Objectives [Key goal of event]: To assess the operational capacity, governance standards, financial integrity, and strategic alignment of applicant ESOs in order to ensure that selected organisations are capable of delivering high-impact support to entrepreneurs
Responsible Team [Lead team/person]: Incubation and Acceleration Lead and the Partner Success Lead
Procurement and Finance needs: Car, fuel, accomodation and per diem

Event Title: Negotiations with ESOs that have passed the due diligence stage
Target Audience [Who is attending?]: ESOs that have passed the due diligence stage
Objectives [Key goal of event]:
Clarify the ESO’s role, target outcomes, and support mechanisms and align on 
budget allocations, staffing, and infrastructure readiness.
Workstreams needed: Finance Lead and the Partner Success Lead

Objectives [Key goal of event]: To equip selected Entrepreneurship Support Organisations (ESOs) with the necessary tools, knowledge, and alignment to effectively implement the
To ensure alignment with each ESO, ensuring that they understand what the programme is all about, and that their proposed plan is both practical and aligned with our shared goals.

Event Title: Pause and Reflect with all ESOs
Objectives [Key goal of event]: To create a dedicated space for ESOs to step back from day-to-day implementation, share experiences, and collectively reflect on progress, challenges, and lessons learned.

Event Title: 10X Program ESOs Comms Capacity Building Session
Objectives [Key goal of event]:
1.	Build a shared understanding of 10X Program communications priorities
– Ensure all partners are aligned on the program’s core messages, safeguarding language, and inclusive framing.
2.	Enhance consistency and visibility of the 10X Program
– Establish clear guidelines for branding, social media use, and reporting to ensure coherence across all communication channels.
3.	Foster knowledge exchange
– Provide a platform for partners to share best practices, challenges, and innovative communication approaches from their contexts.

Event Title: Review of Outbox safeguarding assessment tool
Objectives [Key goal of event]: Work with IIDC on the updated safeguarding assessment

Event Title: Disability Inclusion Training for all 10X program staff
Target Audience [Who is attending?]: All partner staff and their downstream partners
